structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXIX. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ASIAN-AMERICAN ADVISORY BOARD

text.section: The Miami-Dade County Asian-American Advisory Board ("board") shall be composed of twenty-six (26) members who shall be permanent residents and electors of the County in accordance with of the Code of Miami-Dade County as may be amended and who shall have a knowledge of and interest in the county's Asian community. Each County Commissioner shall appoint two (2) members of the board. Board members shall serve four-year terms, and no member may serve more than eight (8) consecutive years in accordance with of the Code of Miami-Dade County as may be amended. This section shall apply to all board members, except that current board members shall be allowed to complete their current terms.
